Name: Lumber Party
About the game: Monkeys in Space! Race your friends to the top to grab the precious Cosmic Banana, in this wacky multiplayer game. Climb trees or break them down to send your opponents falling! Push them off platforms or bounce your way to the top! Do whatever you need to grab that sweet plantain! You can change the settings to change the rules, allowing for tons of different game set ups. You can play with up to four, locally or online.
Meta Title: Lumber Party: Dec 21, 2020, Mr. Moo and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lumber Party? Check out the release date (Dec 21, 2020), developer insights from Mr. Moo, and a complete game summary.
